body:
Dear group,

A quick question.?
Which material can be used to describe a diffuse illuminating pane, cf.?http://www.optilite.dk/ovenlyskupler/pc-ovenlys.html?(hv?lvet opal polycarbonat)?


Best regards

Per Haugaard
